Package team23.smartHomeSimulator.model

Class Room

java.lang.Object
team23.smartHomeSimulator.model.Room
public class Room
extends java.lang.Object
The Room class that includes the list of windows, lights, and doors. In addition, it has attributes of room temperature, room number and room name
